attributes.action: train all prison service staff with a basic understanding of British Sign Language.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Deaf prisoners are currently being treated like second-class prisoners to other hearing inmates. If all prison service staff had a basic understanding of BSL, then it would help bring deaf inmates to a level where they can communicate with the staff, and it will also bring the prison service in line with the Disability Discrimination Act.
